title: Spawrious: A Benchmark for Fine Control of Spurious Correlation Biases. (arXiv:2303.05470v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: The problem of spurious correlations (SCs) arises when a classifier relies on non-predictive features that happen to be correlated with the labels in the training data. For example, a classifier may misclassify dog breeds based on the background of dog images. This happens when the backgrounds are correlated with other breeds in the training data, leading to misclassifications during test time. Previous SC benchmark datasets suffer from varying issues, e.g., over-saturation or only containing one-to-one (O2O) SCs, but no many-to-many (M2M) SCs arising between groups of spurious attributes and classes. In this paper, we present Spawrious-{O2O, M2M}-{Easy, Medium, Hard}, an image classification benchmark suite containing spurious correlations among different dog breeds and background locations. translated_abstract: 当一个分类器依赖于与训练数据标签相关的非预测性特征时，会出现伪相关性（SCs）问题。例如，一个分类器可能会基于狗图像的背景将狗的品种分类错误。当背景与训练数据中其它品种相关联时，会在测试时导致错误分类。以往的SC基准数据集存在不同的问题，例如过度饱和或仅包含一对一（O2O）的SCs，但没有在伪属性和类之间产生许多对多（M2M）的SCs。本文提出了Spawrious -{O2O，M2M}-{Easy，Medium，Hard}，这是一个图像分类基准测试套件，包含不同狗品种和背景位置之间的伪相关性。为了创建这个数据集，我们采用了文本到图像模型来生成照片般逼真的图像，以及图像字幕模型来过滤不适合的图像。这样得到的数据集质量高。
tldr: Spawrious是一个高质量的图像分类基准测试套件，旨在解决分类器依赖未预测特征的问题，包括伪相关性 (SCs)， 数据集具有高度真实性和良好性能，包括多对多 (M2M) 的 SCs。
en_tdlr: Spawrious is a high-quality image classification benchmark suite aimed at addressing the problem of classifiers relying on non-predictive features, including spurious correlations (SCs), with highly realistic and well-performing datasets containing many-to-many (M2M) SCs.
